short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A dashboard for Mechanical Turk workers to filter and display HITs with enhanced design and features

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Enhance Your Productivity on Mechanical Turk!

HitSpooner is a powerful Chrome extension designed to optimize your workflow on Amazon Mechanical Turk. It offers advanced features such as requester blocking, favoriting, and automatic task acceptance to help you manage your HITs more efficiently.

With customizable workspaces, streamlined task tracking, and a user-friendly dashboard that provides real-time insights into your earnings, task queue, and requester performance, HitSpooner is your ultimate companion for boosting productivity on Mechanical Turk.
